title: Tengoku In The Hell
alternative_title: 天国 in the HELL ; Tengoku in the HELL ; Heaven in the Hell
status: 天国 in the HELL ; Tengoku in the HELL ; Heaven in the Hell
description:
Description :
        Yutaka is a man with many faces. He’s an indie label producer, an art space and general store manager, and an escort on the side. While escorting, Yukata is hired by a succubus in training, Tsukasa. Though at first Yukata is wary of Tsukasa, he is soon charmed by him and decides to make Tsukasa into a top idol! Where will these two end up on this super roller coster love comedy?
